name: Sword and Space
description:
• Main plot：In the 12th century, a couple was tired of war and lived in seclusion in the desert, with the curiosity and passion of his youth, his child set foot on the journey of exploring martial arts in the Central Plains. What kind of people and things will he meet ?

  • Game operations: The mouse can take walk and talk, and the keyboard W A S D or ↑ ↓ ← → control direction, space and enter control OK key,too. Press "OK" for a second will be fast forward the plot.

    • Puzzle System：Player will meet three puzzle characters in every village and town, and two puzzle characters in taverns and hotels. Choose the skill that does the most damage to him from the five damage skills will

      end the fight in one round, the other skills will take two rounds.

      Some of the answers may be unconvincing, you can choose to talk to people around to get some explanation, or @streetwriter1 in Twitch. I'll explain it to you from my perspective.
      This puzzle system has no direct connection with the main plot,

      if you don't like this puzzle system, please choose "leave".

      Every time you defeat a enemy, you will add 1 fatigue count, if you defeat 18 enemies, you will get the achievement : REASONS .

    • NOTE：If you are not interested in this theme, please be careful to buy, the plot is 80% of the game.
